issue.title: [Java/Packaging] Run mvn clean in API doc builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2343](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2343). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I had some stale generated code lying around that prevented me from building the API docs. Running `mvn clean` fixed the issue. I'm going to add this to the `create_documents.sh` script.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2343?focusedCommentId=16410085) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1779
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1779>
